level.heading: Licensing needed to transact business.
level.text: No person, other than a domestic, foreign, or non-U.S. title insurer organized on the stock plan and licensed under Chapter 25 of this title [ยง 31-2501.01 et seq.], shall issue a title insurance policy or otherwise transact the business of title insurance in the District.
